009package Ch13_ColorImages;
010
011import java.awt.image.ColorModel;
012import java.awt.image.IndexColorModel;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019
020public class Index_To_Rgb implements PlugInFilter {
021        static final int R = 0, G = 1, B = 2;
022        
023        ImagePlus imp;
024        
025        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
026                this.imp = imp;
027                return DOES_8C + NO_CHANGES; // does not alter original image   
028        }
029
030        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
031                ColorModel cm =  ip.getColorModel();
032                if (!(cm instanceof IndexColorModel)) {
033                        IJ.error("Color model not of type IndexedColorModel");
034                        return;
035                }
036                // retrieve the lookup tables (maps) for R,G,B:
037                IndexColorModel icm = (IndexColorModel) ip.getColorModel(); 
038                int nColors = icm.getMapSize(); 
039                
040                byte[] rMap = new byte[nColors]; 
041                byte[] gMap = new byte[nColors]; 
042                byte[] bMap = new byte[nColors];
043                
044                icm.getReds(rMap); 
045                icm.getGreens(gMap);
046                icm.getBlues(bMap);
047                  
048                // create a new 24-bit RGB image:
049                int w = ip.getWidth();
050                int h = ip.getHeight();
051                ColorProcessor cp = new ColorProcessor(w, h);
052                int[] RGB = new int[3];
053                for (int v = 0; v < h; v++) {
054                        for (int u = 0; u < w; u++) {
055                                int idx = ip.getPixel(u, v);
056                                RGB[R] = 0xFF & rMap[idx];
057                                RGB[G] = 0xFF & gMap[idx];
058                                RGB[B] = 0xFF & bMap[idx];
059                                cp.putPixel(u, v, RGB); 
060                        }
061                }
062                ImagePlus cwin = new ImagePlus(imp.getShortTitle() + " (RGB)", cp);
063                cwin.show();
064        }
065}
066
